attributes.action: Start talking to the Chinese goverment about halting live animal skinnings involving cats and dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is about a very horrible trade which involves skinning live cats and dogs for fur/meat.  Over two million animals die each year, skinned alive because apparently it comes off a live animal easier and then left to die.  Please visit animalsavior.com to watch the horrific video.  We trade with the Chinese and we call ourselves animal lovers.
